TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames extends System.Windows.Media.Animation.RectAnimationBase implements class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild, class System.Windows.Media.Animation.IKeyFrameAnimation
Public Class RectAnimationUsingKeyFrames Inherits RectAnimationBase Implements IAddChild, IKeyFrameAnimation

summary.span: 建立屬性值的動畫，這些屬性值是取自一組主要畫面格的 。

span.span: Animates the value of a property that takes a along a set of key frames.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要畫面格動畫的目標值會由其屬性，其中包含的集合物件。A key frame animation's target values are defined by its property, which contains a collection of objects. 每個定義區段的與它自己的目標動畫和。Each defines a segment of the animation with its own target and . 動畫執行時，執行時從一個索引鍵值到下一個在指定索引鍵的時間。When the animation runs, it progresses from one key value to the next at the specified key times. 有三種類型的類別，一個用於每個支援的內插補點方法： ， ，和。There are three types of classes, one for each supported interpolation method: , , and . 不同於、可以有兩個以上的目標值。Unlike a , a can have more than two target values. 您也可以控制個別的插補方法區段。You can also control the interpolation method of individual segments.

param.name: defaultOriginValue
param.span: 建議的原始值，如果沒有明確設定動畫本身的起始值，便會使用這個值。

span.span: The suggested origin value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set start value.

param.name: defaultDestinationValue
param.span: 建議的目的值，如果沒有明確設定動畫本身的結束值，便會使用這個值。

span.span: The suggested destination value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set end value.

param.name: animationClock
param.span: ，產生主機動畫所用的 或 。

span.span: An that generates the or used by the host animation.

summary.span: 計算值，這個值表示正在建立動畫之屬性的目前值 (由 執行個體所決定)。

span.span: Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by this instance of .

returns.span: 屬性的計算值，由目前的執行個體所決定。

span.span: The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`defaultOriginValue`是第一個組合鏈結中，這個值會是快照集 （如果有的話） 或基底屬性的值，否則這個值會以鏈結中前一個動畫所傳回的值不是已停止。If `defaultOriginValue` is the first in the composition chain, this value will be the snapshot value (if one is available) or the base property value; otherwise this value will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an that is not stopped. `defaultDestinationValue`是基底值，如果動畫會在動畫的屬性上的第一個組合圖層中; 否則值是從上一個組合層次屬性的動畫的輸出值。The `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise, the value is the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出動畫是否將其輸出值加到所要繪製之屬性的基底值。

The default value is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsCumulative { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定動畫重複時是否累加動畫值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the animation's value accumulates when it repeats.

value.span: 如果在動畫重複時累計動畫值則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the animation accumulates its values when it repeats; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為`true`，動畫的輸出時，才會累積值的動畫屬性造成動畫重複其簡單持續期間。When this property is set to `true`, the animation's output values accumulate only when the animation's property causes it to repeat its simple duration. 它不會累積其值或重新啟動時，因為其父代重複，因為它的時鐘已重新啟動從呼叫。It does not accumulate its values when it restarts, because its parent repeated, or because its clock was restarted from a call.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這`ShouldSerialize`方法提供，因為屬性並沒有簡單的預設值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 這個方法會指出屬性是否已變更其預設值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 如果您開發的設計工具通常呼叫這個方法或開發您自己的控制項加入。You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the or developing your own control incorporating the .
